title: Role-Based System Access
description: Manage access to the system by using roles such as owner, admin or read only mode. Set up special withdrawals that require additional approval for increased security.

title: Google Authenticator
description: 2FA increases your account security. As well as your password, you will need a code which is generated by the Google Authenticator app on your phone.

title: Callback Tags
description: There is the possibility to add a callback URL with tags during the creation of deposits.

title: Flexible Confirmations
description: If you want to receive a callback before receiving blockchain confirmations, you can specify the number of confirmations.
